title: Brand value of Reebok 2012 to 2017
yAxis: Brand value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Brand value in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2012.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely neutral which exists from 2017 to 2016.
gold: The statistic shows the brand value of the sports company Reebok from 2012 to 2017 . Reebok had a brand value of 0.8 billion U.S. dollars in 2017 .
